definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地區內的扶輪社在社員發展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: You are responsible for sustaining well-informed and motivated Rotary clubs.
sentences.chinese: 您有責任提供最新的資訊並激勵著扶輪社。

sentences.english: Does the organization allow for equitable representation by clubs in the district?
sentences.chinese: 這個組織是否有讓地區內的扶輪社有公平表現的機會？

sentences.english: How have clubs in your area worked with other community organizations?
sentences.chinese: 你分區內的扶輪社應如何與其他社區組織配合？

sentences.english: Facing an overwhelming task, Froman appealed to his Rotary club .
sentences.chinese: 面臨這麼巨大的任務，福洛曼向他的扶輪社求援。

sentences.english: Request that all clubs participate in a PolioPlus Partners project.
sentences.chinese: 擬定一個合適的新社員訓練計劃並與所有扶輪社分享。

sentences.english: Members of Rotary clubs have already proven themselves to be leaders in their communities.
sentences.chinese: 成爲扶輪社的一員即代表他們是所屬社會中的領導者。

sentences.english: What we can do for rotary club?
sentences.chinese: 獎學生能爲扶輪社友做什麼？

sentences.english: What are some important considerations in producing the club bulletin?
sentences.chinese: 在發行扶輪社社刊時應考慮哪些重點？

sentences.english: It is the carrier of official communications to Rotary club officers.
sentences.chinese: 它是國際扶輪與各扶輪社職員的正式溝通橋樑。

sentences.english: How should your club prepare for the official visit?
sentences.chinese: 你的扶輪社應如何爲公式訪問準備？

sentences.english: Share this information with clubs in your district.
sentences.chinese: 並分享此項訊息給地區內的扶輪社。

sentences.english: How can clubs ensure that funds are manages responsibly?
sentences.chinese: 扶輪社應如何確保基金可靠地管理？

sentences.english: What positive impact will the new grants structure have on club participation?
sentences.chinese: 新的獎助金架構對於扶輪社參與有哪些正面影響？

sentences.english: How does your club recognize the outstanding work or participation of its members?
sentences.chinese: 你的扶輪社如何表揚工作傑出或參與的社友？

sentences.english: How can a club put this motto into action?
sentences.chinese: 一個扶輪社應如何將標語轉換成行動？

definition: Zhanghua or Changhua county in west Taiwan
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Scout (youth organization)/see also 童子軍|童子军[Tong2 zi3 jun1]
member of a board of directors
Shishi county level city in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
